page.title: 14Transport
page.content: Transport plays an important part in the lives of the present inhabitants of Findern. The class ofeleven year old children carried out a survey to find out what parents commonly used. Most peoples parants in the class have their own private form of transport. Most dads have a car,a moped or a motorbike.Mums who work often go by bus like my mum does. Others have a little car that would be bought second hand. Some who have more money may get a new car. Most parents in our class have a car but some have other vehicles.Most children have a bycicle which they ride to school.Some mums and dads do too.
